content: I agree that everyone contributes to the global design of the experience or product, because thats what design is, finding a solution to a problem and more heads will find a better solution! But the same way a designer doesn’t defines a product price should a non designer defines colors, fonts, or something design related? If i have an electrical problem in my house i don’t tell the electrician how to do his job! One thing is to have an opinion, other is to do design with intention!
